extendedInfo.description: Secure9 Mail is a free and open-source email client built on K9 Mail v2.9. It adds AES encryption, as well as key management and key agreement through Diffie-Hellman.

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I have been having an issue where I cannot read the body of some emails unless I view them via some other web based client app.  This app resolves the issue and it will become my primary droid email app.  Fantastic app!
reviews.author: Lou Flores

reviews.comment: No matter how many times I mark a message read, it will mark itself unread. Email timeline not correct. Worse than k9 mail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unfair ratings (1-2-3!)
reviews.comment: I am using this app for over 2 years, now I upgraded the phone and this is the first app I have installed from a pretty good list... Maybe it is not a five stars app, but definitely NOT less then four! I give a five stars rating, in order to compensate at least for the1\'s and 2\'s. Thank you for the great job done!
reviews.author: Alex Itport

reviews.title: Best free e-mail client available for Android
reviews.comment: Reads attachments correctly and easily. Unified inbox with multiple accounts (Webmail and POP3) all color coded (and you can choose the colors...trivial I know, but). Very nice control over alerts and notifications. The way it allows you to access webmail folder is way better than GMail in my opinion. Oh, and a much wider range of polling options than GMail...you can have it check for new mail every minute if you want. I have not experienced any bugs so far and now use this as my primary e-mail app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried all day, and several apps to get my Droid X to send emails. Couldn\'t, till Secure9. Best in my book...only one that worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What is up with the message flashing @ the top of every email i open, stating \"web page not available\" with some URL that disappears? Disconcerting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: It works, so thats what the 3 stars are for. But evrytime i get emails it adds an unread email titled \"no subject\" which isnt actually in my inbox.  If u try to read or delete these the app crashes, i now have 8 of these annoying things in the way. Nice try, but uninstall for me.
reviews.author: Hailo G

reviews.comment: Application restarts itself even with start-up/auto-start app mgrs running. Come on, dev. If I kill the app, it should stay dead! Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fetches email in real time on my Captivate unlike the original K-9 program. Bugs include freezing, loading blank mails with no subject etc.Good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its the best mail program I found for Android. Waleed El-Kaissy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mostly good
reviews.comment: I love the fact you can have an individual mail arrival sound rather than the global notification sound. I hate unified inboxes with a passion though, and could not find a way to turn them off. Well, not a way that worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Would like further Dev, please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Very good email app! Has lots of power including the ability to create other identities in case you may want to send mail with out your full name.  Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Set up multiple accounts in one inbox, which default mail couldn\'t do. Tops. HTC Desire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow this works very well with exchange.... Good Job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: Not bad but, not my favorite
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good so far. Now I get gmail notification which stopped working on gmail app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works most of the time very well but...
reviews.comment: It closes too many times right out the blue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good app. Better for experienced users.
reviews.author: A Google User
